explains: v. 安排，筹备；整理，布置，排列；改编；商定
wordGroup: arrange for 安排；为…做准备

sentences.en: Can I arrange an appointment for Monday?
sentences.cn: 我可以安排星期一约见吗？

sentences.en: I will arrange for someone to take you around.
sentences.cn: 我会安排好人领你转转。

sentences.en: The hotel manager will arrange for a babysitter.
sentences.cn: 宾馆经理会安排一位保姆。
